name: 4 Wheel Combat ( 3d Car Racing Action Game )
name_original: 4 Wheel Combat ( 3d Car Racing Action Game )
description:
4 Wheel Combat is an action packed CAR COMBAT with STUNNING VISUALS and HOURS of CARS CRUSHING and EXPLOSIVE RACING FUN.
Humiliate and destroy your opponents.
NO TRICK IS TOO DIRTY! to win this game.
* Massive single player mode, unlock and upgrade cars, weapons and challenge
* Awesome controls
* Leaderboards via Game Center
* Runs silky smooth
